description:
First, deck the halls with ninja stars! The ninjas are having their first Christmas ever and it`s up to Kaede to teach them about the holiday spirit! But what kind of gift do you get for a ninja?  Then, a little "end of the year cleaning" yields a box fil
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I. Natal Ninja! / II. Ninja, Amaldiçoado!
Les ninjas fêtent Noël / La malédiction ninja
Ninja, Christmas no Maki / Ninja, Norowareru no Maki
The Ninjas Have Christmas / The Ninja Are Cursed
忍者, クリスマスるの巻 / 忍者, 呪われるの巻
